div.p: External Code System (CS) information for code systems published in HL7 Standards. The code system metadata record is information about a non-HL7 code system and the record only exists because there is a Code System used in HL7 implementations.

The resources that are defined here are for the convenience of HL7 implementers. These are naming system resources which serve the special purpose of capturing for easy access the metadata from the organizations that publish these, along with possibly multiple different identifiers for these Code Systems (CS) that have been used in the past, as well as those that are currently preferred. They are made available here for those that are looking for identifiers that may have been published in the past in HL7 Standards, but have been superceded since that time.
